item.title: Fallen tree on the side of A40 Lansdown Road, 6th December
item.description:
Fallen tree on A40 Lansdown Road by exit of Dean Close Preparatory School. Still attached to ground. Danger of blowing into A40 from current wind direction. What 3 words hungry.lock.carbon

item.title: Wet leaves on pavement, 6th December
item.description:
Wet leaves on pavement from corner to past the bus stop, it’s slippery and dangerous when walking along this section of the path. This is a busy pavement and should be cleaned regularly at this time of year every year.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheltenham Road East, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves on pavement, 6th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Saint John's Avenue, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Finlay Way is not fit for purpose, 6th December
item.description:
All of the drains (covers and Gulley's) and general condition of surface need to be replaced. The road is over 30years old and is subjected to increased levels of commercial traffic since being laid in the mid 90's. You also need to check with planning how this road is registered because its Findlay Way on some maps and Evesham road on others so could be the reason why its maintenance is falling through the cracks. Areas where it has been widened are not within the regulations and thus causing damage to adjoining properties. You need to stop wasting money patching it and rebuild/relay the road in a condition suitable for the tarffic

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 1, Bramble Chase, Bishop's Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Path covered in watet this Friday needs filling, 5th December
item.description:
Path holes needs filling in. This will enable water to run off. Currently users are going to the edge of the path and being splashed by cars. Hope it gets done before the water freezes.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Up Hatherley Way, Hatherley, Cheltenham

item.title: Tree is damaged problem, 5th December
item.description:
Customer reporting that a large branch (5-6ft long) has fallen out of the tree at location. Branch has now be pushed to the side, but multiple branches have fallen out of the tree in the past few days and they are concerned that the tree may be unhealthy.

item.title: Blocked drains on Gloucester main road, near Brickfield Drive exit, 5th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 170, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flooded Footpath - Happens every time it rains, 5th December
item.description:
At the end of Jasmin way there is a footpath, regularly used by kids walking to school, mums with prams etc. When it rains the path cannot be passed. See image. This issue was reported a few weeks back but not resolved as they only trimmed the grass verge. Some form of proper drainage is needed here / soak away. This has been the case for years and something needs to be done about it.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 2, Stancombe Grove, Warden Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same
